channel.title: Need help with running server
channel.description:
right i start of liek this, i open my source/server file it has everyhting done, i have a no-ip and hamachi ive also port forwarded, so when i use "runserver.bat" it says its started the server, then what do i do? do i open the moparscape client and log in? plz help cos if i do that it just lags and logs me out again
help me and ill give u an admin status once it runs ok and ive finished thecoding, cheers :P
